1. How much of the syllabus was covered in the class? 2. How well did the teachers prepare for the classes? 3. How well were the teachers able to communicate? 4. The teacher’s approach to teaching can best be described as 5. Fairness of the internal evaluation process by the teachers. 6. Was your performance in assignments discussed with you? 7. The institute takes active interest in promoting internship, student exchange, field visit opportunities for students.
8. The teaching and mentoring process in your institution facilitates you in cognitive, social and emotional growth.
9. The institution provides multiple opportunities to learn and grow. 10. Teachers inform you about your expected competencies, course outcomes and programme outcomes.
11. Your mentor does a necessary follow-up with an assigned task to you. 12. The teachers illustrate the concepts through examples and applications. 13. The teachers identify your strengths and encourage you with providing right level of challenges.
14. Teachers are able to identify your weaknesses and help you to overcome them. 15. The institution makes effort to engage students in the monitoring, review and continuous quality improvement of the teaching learning process.
16. The institute/ teachers use student centric methods, such as experiential learning, participative learning and problem solving methodologies for enhancing learning experiences.
17. Teachers encourage you to participate in extracurricular activities. 18. Efforts are made by the institute/ teachers to inculcate soft skills, life skills and employability skills to make you ready for the world of work.
19. What percentage of teachers use ICT tools such as LCD projector, Multimedia, etc. while teaching.
20. The overall quality of teaching-learning process in your institute is very good.
21. Give three observation / suggestions to improve the overall teaching – learning experience in your institution.
Standard operative Mechanisms are in place
Prompt learner Grievances Redressal Mechanisms
Supportive and Co-Operative staff
1.Seating arrangement was adequate and comfortable ? 2.The fans and lights were sufficient and working ? 3.Drinking water was provided during examination ? 4.The examination hall was calm and noise ? 5.The behavior and conduct of invigilators and other staff at examination centre was cordial ?
1.Appropriate instructions were given before and during examination ? 2.Time schedule was properly followed ? 3.Were there any mistakes in the question papers ? 4.The mistakes in question were timely intimated to you and corrected ? 5.Did you experience any difficulty in using answer sheet with designated space for ?
MCQ BAQ SAQ LAQ
//summative questions
1)Are you aware of the scheme of examination ? 2)Are you aware about the pattern of question paper ? 3)Was the time table displayed well in advanced ? 4)Was the course content displayed well in advanced ?
Were all types of question (MCQ, BAQ,SAQ, LAQ) in adequate number ? Was time allotted to each section is adequate ? Was distribution of questions according to the weightage given in the syllabus Were the marks allotted to each type of question appropriate ? Was structuring of questions appropriate ?
Customized answer sheet is a more organized way of attempting questions ? A Customized answer sheet allows to manage the time properly ? I feel that customized answer will improve my score ? A Customized answer sheet will reduce oversights in evaluation ?
Was infrastructure and arrangement for conduct of practical examination adequate and proper Was atmosphere conducive Were instructions given well in advance Was examination conducted as per the structured format Was the time given adequate for each station Was examination conducted in fair and impartial way Enrol No :
